post:
2 new dark themes for Blesta released!  
  
**Odin Hosting Template** - [https://marketplace.aalayer.com/themes/odin-dark-theme-blesta/](https://marketplace.aalayer.com/themes/odin-dark-theme-blesta/ "https://marketplace.aalayer.com/themes/odin-dark-theme-blesta/") - Only 59$.
  
**Zeus Hosting Template** - [https://marketplace.aalayer.com/themes/zeus-dark-theme-blesta/](https://marketplace.aalayer.com/themes/zeus-dark-theme-blesta/ "https://marketplace.aalayer.com/themes/zeus-dark-theme-blesta/") - Only 59$.  
  
  

**What you will get**:
* An unique and modern hosting theme
* 3 folders, HTML Theme + Blesta Theme + Blesta CMS Pro Theme
* 1 year free support

Apply the code **LES10** for a more 10% discount while purchasing.
